decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

01 B (Title Sheet), 02 (Photos), 03 (Approved Ground Floor Plan), 04 (Approved First Floor Plan), 05 (Approved Roof Plan), 06 (Approved Front and Rear Elevations), 07 (Approved Side Elevations), 08 (Approved 3D Views), 09 (Photos), 10 (Photos), 11 (Photos), 12 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 13 (Proposed Roof Plan), 14 (Proposed Front and Rear Elevations), 15 (Proposed Side Elevations), 16 (Proposed 3D Views), 17 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 18 (Existing First Floor Plan), 19 (Existing Roof Plan), 20 (Existing Front and Rear Elevations), 21 (Existing Side Elevations), 22 A (Proposed First Floor Plan), Reasonable Exemption Statement.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - The external surfaces of the development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the details provided in Drawing No. 14 (Proposed Front and Rear Elevations), 15 (Proposed Side Elevations), and the submitted application form.

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey front extension incorporating porch; part single part two storey side to rear extension; single storey side extension; single storey rear extension; external alterations
